allow: Bash(# Check if the running server has the API key lsof -i :8000 -t | head -1 | xargs -I {} ps -p {} -o pid,command)
Bash(# Check if the key exists in common locations grep -l ""ANTHROPIC_API_KEY"" ~/.zshrc ~/.bashrc ~/.bash_profile)

Bash(__NEW_LINE_6084caeb8ebec7ba__ duckdb -c "
WITH cycles AS \(
    SELECT entity_id, MAX\(I\) as lifespan
    FROM read_parquet\(''/Users/jasonrudder/prism_engines-prism/data/cmapss/physics.parquet''\)
    GROUP BY entity_id
\),
topo AS \(
    SELECT entity_id, AVG\(betti_0\) as mean_b0, AVG\(topological_complexity\) as complexity
    FROM read_parquet\(''/Users/jasonrudder/prism_engines-prism/data/cmapss/topology.parquet''\)
    GROUP BY entity_id
\),
info AS \(
    SELECT entity_id, AVG\(hierarchy_score\) as hierarchy, AVG\(n_feedback_loops\) as loops
    FROM read_parquet\(''/Users/jasonrudder/prism_engines-prism/data/cmapss/information_flow.parquet''\)
    GROUP BY entity_id
\),
dyn AS \(
    SELECT entity_id, AVG\(lyapunov_max\) as lyapunov, AVG\(determinism\) as det
    FROM read_parquet\(''/Users/jasonrudder/prism_engines-prism/data/cmapss/dynamics.parquet''\)
    GROUP BY entity_id
\),
combined AS \(
    SELECT c.entity_id, c.lifespan, t.mean_b0, t.complexity, i.hierarchy, i.loops, d.lyapunov, d.det
    FROM cycles c
    LEFT JOIN topo t ON c.entity_id = t.entity_id
    LEFT JOIN info i ON c.entity_id = i.entity_id
    LEFT JOIN dyn d ON c.entity_id = d.entity_id
\)
SELECT
    ROUND\(CORR\(lifespan, mean_b0\), 3\) as ''β₀_vs_life'',
    ROUND\(CORR\(lifespan, complexity\), 3\) as ''complexity_vs_life'',
    ROUND\(CORR\(lifespan, hierarchy\), 3\) as ''hierarchy_vs_life'',
    ROUND\(CORR\(lifespan, loops\), 3\) as ''loops_vs_life'',
    ROUND\(CORR\(lifespan, lyapunov\), 3\) as ''lyapunov_vs_life'',
    ROUND\(CORR\(lifespan, det\), 3\) as ''det_vs_life''
FROM combined
")
Bash(for dir in femto fama_french metropt ims care_wind scania)

Bash(then python3 -c "import polars as pl; df = pl.read_parquet\(''$path/observations.parquet''\); print\(f'' Rows: {len\(df\):,}''\); print\(f'' Entities: {df.select\(pl.col\(""entity_id""\).n_unique\(\)\).item\(\)}''\)")
